newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: CRICKET-PAKISTAN BOARD XI 8-0 V ZIMBABWE (307-7 DEC) - CLOSE.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-PAKISTAN BOARD XI 8-0 V ZIMBABWE (307-7 DEC) - CLOSE.

text.p: A Pakistan Board XI were eight without loss in reply to Zimbabwe's first innings total of 307 for seven declared on the opening day of a three-day match on Saturday.
